scripts.build:main: mkdir -p build/scripts && rollup -i ./lib/main.js -o ./build/scripts/main.js -c -m && cd build/scripts && uglifyjs --source-map main.min.js.map -m --screw-ie8 main.js -o main.min.js && wc -c main.min.js
scripts.build:sw: mkdir -p build           && rollup -i ./lib/sw.js     -o ./build/sw.js   -c -m       && cd build && uglifyjs --source-map sw.min.js.map   -m --screw-ie8 sw.js   -o sw.min.js   && wc -c sw.min.js
scripts.build:js: npm run build:sw && npm run build:main
scripts.watch: ./parallel.sh "nodemon --watch ./lib -e js --exec npm run build:js" "nodemon --watch ./client -e css,html,png,json --exec npm run build:other" "http-server build"
scripts.build: npm run clean; npm run build:other && npm run build:js
